metadata.title: CVE-2021-47464 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:audit: fix possible null-pointer dereference in audit_filter_rulesFix  possible null-pointer dereference in audit_filter_rules.audit_filter_rules() error: we previously assumed 'ctx' could be null

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
